name: Heavy Cream Substitute (Vegan)
description: Wondering how to replace heavy cream? This vegan heavy cream substitute is perfect for stirring into soups, curries and anywhere else cream is called for!

recipeInstructions.text: Bring 3 cups of water to a boil. Pour the hot water over the cashews and let soak for at least 5 minutes, or up to 3 hours.
recipeInstructions.name: Bring 3 cups of water to a boil. Pour the hot water over the cashews and let soak for at least 5 minutes, or up to 3 hours.

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the cashews and discard the soaking water. Add them to a high powered blender along with 1 1/2 cups of fresh water and blend for a few minutes until very smooth and creamy.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain the cashews and discard the soaking water. Add them to a high powered blender along with 1 1/2 cups of fresh water and blend for a few minutes until very smooth and creamy.

recipeInstructions.text: Use immediately anywhere you would heavy cream, or store in a covered container in the refrigerator until ready to use. It will keep in the refrigerator for about 1 week.
